name: n8n-datevconnect
description: n8n community node for DATEVconnect API via Klardaten Gateway

scripts.build: bun run clean && sh -c 'NODES=$(find nodes -name "*.node.ts" -print) && [ -z "$NODES" ] || bun build $NODES --outdir dist/nodes --format cjs --target=node --external n8n-workflow --external n8n-core' && sh -c 'CREDS=$(find credentials -name "*.credentials.ts" -print) && [ -z "$CREDS" ] || bun build $CREDS --outdir dist/credentials --format cjs --target=node --external n8n-workflow --external n8n-core' && cp nodes/klardaten.svg dist/nodes/
scripts.watch: bun run clean && sh -c 'NODES=$(find nodes -name "*.node.ts" -print) && [ -z "$NODES" ] || bun build $NODES --outdir dist/nodes --format cjs --target=node --external n8n-workflow --external n8n-core --watch' & sh -c 'CREDS=$(find credentials -name "*.credentials.ts" -print) && [ -z "$CREDS" ] || bun build $CREDS --outdir dist/credentials --format cjs --target=node --external n8n-workflow --external n8n-core --watch'
